snippet: Walmart said it would reopen five stores whose closure prompted a union to file a complaint claiming retaliation against workers for organizing.
abstract: Walmart announces it will reopen five stores and encourage former employees to apply for jobs; closures prompted United Food and Commercial Workers International to file complaint with National Labor Relations Board, claiming closures were retaliation against workers for trying to unionize.
lead_paragraph: Walmart said it would reopen five stores whose closure prompted a union to file a complaint claiming retaliation against workers for organizing.

headline.main: Walmart to Reopen 5 Stores Named in Union Complaint
headline.print_headline: Walmart to Reopen 5 Stores Named in Union Complaint

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
